nodes.text: A damping emitter was a lightsaber emitter that had been modified to release a limited amount of energy, making the lightsaber's blade non-lethal. A damping emitter cost 2,000 credits.
Damping emitters were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
